Class InternshipRepository

java.lang.Object
database.InternshipRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
CrudRepository<Internship, String>
public class InternshipRepository extends Object implements CrudRepository<Internship, String>
In-memory repository for Internship entities with comprehensive query capabilities and CSV persistence.

This repository manages internship postings through their complete lifecycle from creation through approval, publication, and fulfillment. It provides rich querying capabilities for filtering internships by various criteria and handles complex state management.

Internship Lifecycle States:

  • PENDING: Newly created by company, awaiting staff approval
  • APPROVED: Approved by staff, can be made visible to students
  • REJECTED: Denied by staff, not shown to students
  • FILLED: All available slots have been confirmed (auto-set when slots full)

Visibility Control: Internships have a separate visibility flag independent of approval status. An approved internship can be visible (shown to students) or hidden (not shown). This allows companies and staff to control when postings go live.

Slot Management:

  • maxSlots: Maximum number of students that can be accepted
  • confirmedSlots: Number of students who have accepted offers
  • FILLED status: Automatically set when confirmedSlots == maxSlots

Query Capabilities: Supports filtering by:

  • Status (PENDING, APPROVED, REJECTED, FILLED)
  • Level (FRESHMAN, SOPHOMORE, JUNIOR, SENIOR, BASIC)
  • Preferred major (case-insensitive)
  • Company name (case-insensitive)
  • Date ranges (open/close dates)
  • Visibility status
  • Availability (has remaining slots)

CSV Persistence Features:

  • Preserves internship IDs using Java reflection
  • Restores ID counter to continue from highest loaded ID
  • Handles all status states including FILLED
  • Restores visibility, slot counts, and approval states

CSV Format: 

 Header: InternshipID,Title,Description,Level,PreferredMajor,OpenDate,CloseDate,Status,CompanyName,MaxSlots,ConfirmedSlots,Visible
 Example: INT001,Software Intern,Java development,JUNIOR,Computer Science,2025-01-01,2025-03-01,APPROVED,Tech Corp,5,2,true
See Also:

    • save

      public Internship save(Internship entity)
      Description copied from interface: CrudRepository
      Saves an entity to the repository (insert or update).

      Upsert Behavior:

      • If an entity with the same ID exists, it is replaced (update)
      • If no entity with the ID exists, it is added (insert)

      The entity's ID must not be null when saved.

      Specified by:
      save in interface CrudRepository<Internship, String>
      Parameters:
      entity - the entity to save (must not be null, ID must not be null)
      Returns:
      the saved entity

    • saveAll

      public List<Internship> saveAll(Iterable<Internship> entities)
      Description copied from interface: CrudRepository
      Saves multiple entities to the repository.

      Convenience method for bulk operations. Each entity is saved using the same upsert logic as CrudRepository.save(Object).

      Specified by:
      saveAll in interface CrudRepository<Internship, String>
      Parameters:
      entities - the entities to save (must not be null)
      Returns:
      a list of all saved entities in the order they were processed

      Deletes multiple entities by their identifiers.

      Convenience method for bulk deletion. For each ID, if an entity exists, it is removed; otherwise, that ID is silently ignored.
